subject: Luge Racing
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: A top Russian luge official said that organizers of the 2014 Sochi Olympics would be “extra cautious” building a sliding center after originally planning the world’s fastest and most difficult track.
snippet: A top Russian luge official said that organizers of the 2014 Sochi Olympics would be “extra cautious” building a sliding center after originally planning the world’s fastest and most difficult track.
